summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chat Module (Comunidade STUFF). All 14 requested features are working correctly. Backend: 17/17 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements functional including WebSocket connection, message sending, emoji picker, online users sidebar, and admin moderation options.
passed_tests: WebSocket conecta com token válido - PASS (status 'Conectado' displayed)
Mensagens são salvas no banco com TTL de 2 dias - PASS (expire_at field verified)
GET /api/chat/messages retorna mensagens - PASS (returns list with required fields)
GET /api/chat/online retorna usuários online - PASS (returns list)
Indicador de status de conexão (Conectado/Desconectado) - PASS
Lista de usuários online na sidebar - PASS (shows user count and names)
Envio de mensagem funciona - PASS (message count increased after send)
Emojis são exibidos corretamente - PASS (emoji picker functional)
Admin vê opções de moderação (deletar mensagem, banir usuário) - PASS (DropdownMenu with options)
DELETE /api/chat/messages/{id} funciona para admin - PASS (requires admin role, returns 404 for non-existent)
POST /api/chat/ban funciona para admin - PASS (ban/unban workflow tested)
Usuário sem login vê mensagem 'Faça login para acessar o chat' - PASS
seed_data_creation: Test user created for ban workflow testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chat module fully implemented and tested. WebSocket URL: wss://dublin-exchange.preview.emergentagent.com/api/chat/ws?token=JWT_TOKEN. REST endpoints: /api/chat/messages, /api/chat/online, /api/chat/ban-status, /api/chat/ban, /api/chat/bans. Messages have 2-day TTL via MongoDB expire_at index. Admin can delete messages and ban users. Email notifications and Stripe payments remain MOCKED.
